instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description: This is a generative art display made up of beads
text: You can interact with it by using the buttons in the controls section in the bottom left of the screen..
You can also click/touch and drag to rotate the scene.
Drag over the screen or click 'Upload' to load an .obj file to change the object rendered.
Drag over the screen or click 'Upload' to load a square .png file to change the material.
